.. _Installation:

Installation
------------

Kalkayotl needs the following packages:

.. code-block:: Python

	numpy >= 1.14
	emcee >= 2.2.1
	scipy >= 1.0


Additionally but not necessarily, if you want to analyse the different types of prior, then you will need:

.. code-block:: Python

	matplotlib  >= 2.1.1
	pandas      >= 0.22
	progressbar >= 2.3
	astroML     >= 0.3

The code has a GPL 3.0 licence, thus you can download it at GitHub `kalkayotl <https://github.com/olivares-j/kalkayotl>`_. .
